segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
21. Sappurisavagga
202. Assaddhasutta
“Asappurisañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, asappurisena asappurisatarañca;
segments.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,

segments.pli: sappurisañca, sappurisena sappurisatarañca. Taṃ suṇātha … pe ….
segments.en: a good person and a better person.

segments.pli: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappuriso?
segments.en: And what is a bad person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, appassuto hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti, duppañño hoti.
segments.en: It’s someone who is faithless, shameless, imprudent, with little learning, lazy, unmindful, and witless.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappuriso.
segments.en: This is called a bad person.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisena asappurisataro?
segments.en: And what is a worse person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca assaddho hoti, parañca assaddhiye samādapeti;
segments.en: It’s someone who is faithless, shameless, imprudent, with little learning, lazy, confused, and witless. And they encourage others in these same qualities.

segments.pli: attanā ca ahiriko hoti, parañca ahirikatāya samādapeti;
attanā ca anottappī hoti, parañca anottappe samādapeti;
attanā ca appassuto hoti, parañca appassute samādapeti;
attanā ca kusīto hoti, parañca kosajje samādapeti;
attanā ca muṭṭhassati hoti, parañca muṭṭhassacce samādapeti;
attanā ca duppañño hoti, parañca duppaññatāya samādapeti.
Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappurisena asappurisataro.
segments.en: This is called a worse person.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappuriso?
segments.en: And what is a good person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, satimā hoti, paññavā hoti.
segments.en: It’s someone who is faithful, conscientious, prudent, learned, energetic, mindful, and wise.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sappuriso.
segments.en: This is called a good person.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappurisena sappurisataro?
segments.en: And what is a better person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
segments.en: It’s someone who is personally accomplished in faith, conscience, prudence, learning, energy, mindfulness, and wisdom. And they encourage others in these same qualities.

segments.pli: attanā ca hirimā hoti, parañca hirimatāya samādapeti;
attanā ca ottappī hoti, parañca ottappe samādapeti;
attanā ca bahussuto hoti, parañca bāhusacce samādapeti;
attanā ca āraddhavīriyo hoti, parañca vīriyārambhe samādapeti;
attanā ca upaṭṭhitassati hoti, parañca satiupaṭṭhāne samādapeti;
attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, parañca paññāsampadāya samādapeti.
Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sappurisena sappurisataro”ti.
segments.en: This is called a better person.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.

sections.title: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and…

suttaplex.blurb: A good person has faith and other good qualities, while a better person encourages others to develop these.
